name: The VTuber Summit
storyline: Join Yu, a new VTuber who seeks to reach The VTuber Summit in order to make their debut. As you and Yu grow together in strength and number to overcome the challenge of defeating 100 VTubers, a creeping mystery begins to slowly reveal itself, drastically changing the course of your journey - the path isn't as straightforward to the top as it seems!
summary: Journey into a world featuring a miscellany of independent VTubers and creators, in this large-scale collaborative VTuber RPG! Fight your way to the Summit through a 100-battle gauntlet, in order to seize your dreams and become the new champion!
